name: Beluga Tube
description:
A silly arcade game by Seth Pearson & Andrew Nack

Dive as many belugas as you can into dogger's tube without missing! Once the tube has been missed, your belugas will fly away to where they belong. Also, keep your eye out for the spirit of King Beluga, more doggers, and bluegas (blue belugas worth double points)!

Features
● Wacky diving gameplay
● Sweet soundtrack
● Adorable characters

Do you have what it takes to become a master tuber?

-Song lyrics-
Bel-uga
Belu-lu-luga
Bel-uga
Fly away you're my friends
